comments: LOVE her!!! Definitely a fun and easy class!
Great class to take to lighten any stressful semester! Fun and enjoyable! Highly recommended!

This is possibly the easiest A you can get. No homework. The midterm and final was performing a dance for the teacher. All you need to get an A in this class is to go to class and try. even if you\'re really bad..trying will get you an A
A bit of a struggle to get down the steps, but don\'t be lazy, be enthusiastic, don\'t miss class, be nice to Pirrette and dance dance dance!
HIGHLY RECOMMENDED!! She\'s so cute and funny! You have to take this class before you graduate! It\'s fun and a great workout. Easy A. Just attend class and learn the dances! Not hard at all.
She\'s the best!! She\'s hilarious and really nice. Easy A if you go to class and learn the dances. Highly recommended!
She is the best. Make sure you go to class because attendance plays a big role in your grade. This class is a workout, the dancing is intense. I loved her class, and I learned how to African dance.
